BaseViewer class¶

class orb.visual.BaseViewer(config_file_name='config.orb', no_log=True, debug=False)¶

Bases: object

This class implements a basic viewer based on GINGA for FITS/HDF5 cubes created with ORB modules.

See also

GINGA project: http://ejeschke.github.io/ginga/

__init__(config_file_name='config.orb', no_log=True, debug=False)¶

Init BaseViewer

Parameters:
  • config_file_name¶ – (Optional) Name of ORB config file (default ‘config.orb’).
  • no_log¶ – (Optional) If True no logfile will be created for ORB specific warnings, info and errors (default True).
  • debug¶ – (Optional) If True, all messages from Ginga are printed on stdout (default False).
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

_build_colorbar()¶

Return a colorbar frame.

Mostly copied from GingaGtk.build_colorbar()

_display_header_cb(c)¶

display-header callback

Popup a window with the printed header

_get_new_object()¶

Return new boxes on the image display.

_get_plugins()¶

A list of plugins (returned as a list of gtk.Box instance) may be defined and incerted here. It will be packed vartically at the bottom of the basic view.

_key_pressed_cb(c, key)¶

key-pressed callback.

Parameters:
  • c¶ – Caller Instance
  • key¶ – key pressed
_key_released_cb(c, key)¶

key-released callback.

Parameters:
  • c¶ – Caller Instance
  • key¶ – key pressed
_mouse_motion_cb(c, button, data_x, data_y)¶

mouse-motion callback

Called when the mouse is moving on the image display.

Display some informations on the mouse position.

Parameters:
  • c¶ – Caller instance
  • button¶ – button pressed while moving (e.g. ctrl or shift)
  • data_x¶ – X position of the mouse on the image display.
  • data_y¶ – Y position of the mouse on the image display.
_open_file_cb(c)¶

open-file callback

Popup a File chooser dialog to open a new file

_quit_cb(c)¶

quit callback.

Quit viewer.

Parameters:c¶ – Caller instance
_reload_file()¶

Reload a file and update the displayed data. The file might have a new size.

_save_image_cb(c)¶

save-image callback

Pop a file chooser dialog to save the displayed Image

Parameters:c¶ – Caller Instance
_set_autocut_method_cb(c, idx)¶

autocut-method-changed callback

Changes the autocut method

Parameters:
  • c¶ – Caller Instance
  • idx¶ – Index of the new autocut method in self.autocut_methods list
_set_image_index_cb(c)¶

value-changed callback

Changed the index of the displayed image

Parameters:c¶ – Caller Instance
_start_box_cb(c, button, data_x, data_y)¶

start-drawing-box callback

Start drawing a box, delete old drawn boxes

Parameters:
  • c¶ – Caller instance
  • button¶ – button pressed while drawing (e.g. ctrl or shift)
  • data_x¶ – X position when mouse button pressed
  • data_y¶ – Y position when mouse button pressed
_stop_box_cb(c, button, data_x, data_y)¶

stop-drawing-box callback

Stop drawing a box

Parameters:
  • c¶ – Caller instance
  • button¶ – button pressed while drawing (e.g. ctrl or shift)
  • data_x¶ – X position when mouse button released
  • data_y¶ – Y position when mouse button released
get_widget()¶

Return root widget

load_file(filepath, reload=False, chip_index=1)¶

Load the file to display. Can be a FITS or HDF5 cube.

Parameters:
  • filepath¶ – Path to the file.
  • reload¶ – (Optional) Must be set to True if the file is reloaded (default False)
pop_file_chooser_dialog(action, mode='save')¶

Pop a a file chooser dialog

Parameters:action¶ – Method launched when file path has been defined.
save_image(filepath)¶

Save an image as a FITS file

Parameters:filepath¶ – File path.
update_image(im)¶

Update displayed image

Parameters:im¶ – New image to display

Bases: object

Basic popup window frame

__init__(title='Popup', size=(300, 300))¶

Init Popup Window

Parameters:
  • title¶ – (Optional) Window title (default ‘Popup’).
  • size¶ – (Optional) Window size (default (300,300)).
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

show()¶

Show popup window

class orb.visual.HeaderWindow(header)¶

Bases: orb.visual.PopupWindow

Header window.

Display and manage a pyfits.Header instance

__init__(header)¶

Init and construct header window.

Parameters:header¶ – header to display. Must be a pyfits.Header instance.

ZPlotWindow class¶

class orb.visual.ZPlotWindow(step, order, wavenumber, bunit)¶

Bases: orb.visual.PopupWindow

Implement a window for plotting zaxis data.

__init__(step, order, wavenumber, bunit)¶

Init and construct spectrum window.

Parameters:
  • step¶ – Step size [in nm]
  • order¶ – Aliasing Order
  • bunit¶ – Flux unit (string)
Wavenumber:

True if data axis is in wavenumber, False if in wavelength, None otherwise.
_get_zaxis(n)¶

Return the best zaxis based on known parameters

Parameters:n¶ – Number of samples
update(zdata=None, zaxis=None)¶

Update plot

Parameters:
  • zdata¶ – Data to plot (Y)
  • zaxis¶ – X axis.

FitPlugin class¶

class orb.visual.FitPlugin(step=None, order=None, apod=None, update_cb=None, wavenumber=True)¶

Bases: object

Fitting plugin that can be added to the ZPlot module.

__init__(step=None, order=None, apod=None, update_cb=None, wavenumber=True)¶

Init FitPlugin class

Parameters:
  • step¶ – (Optional) Step size in nm (default None).
  • order¶ – (Optional) Folding order (default None).
  • apod¶ – (Optional) Apodization (default None).
  • update_cb¶ – (Optional) function to call when the visual object displaying the spectrum must be updated (the ZPlot window) (default None).
  • wavenumber¶ – (Optional) If True spectrum to fit is in wavenumber (default True).
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

_add_fit_line_cb(w)¶

Add a line to the list of lines to fit.

Action called by the ‘+’ button.

Parameters:w¶ – Widget
_change_fit_lines(add)¶

Add or delete a fit line.

Parameters:add¶ – If True line is added, if False line is deleted.
_del_fit_line_cb(w)¶

Delete a line from the list of lines to fit.

Action called by the ‘-‘ button.

Parameters:w¶ – Widget
_fit_lines_in_spectrum(w)¶

Fit lines in the given spectrum

Parameters:w¶ – Widget
_get_axis()¶

Return fit axis

_get_calib_map_path_cb(w)¶

Callback to set the calibration laser map.

Parameters:w¶ – Widget.
_get_line_nm(line_name)¶

Return lines wavelength in nm

Parameters:line_name¶ – Name of the lines
_get_lines_keys()¶

Return lines keys.

_get_spectrum_range()¶

Return min and max wavelength of the spectrum

_set_apod_cb(w)¶

Callback to set the step apodization function.

Parameters:w¶ – Widget
_set_calib_map(file_path)¶

Set calibration laser map.

Parameters:file_path¶ – Calibration laser map path.
_set_line_name_cb(w, idx)¶

Callback to set the line names

Parameters:
  • w¶ – Widget.
  • idx¶ – Index of the selected line.
_set_order_cb(w)¶

Callback to set the folding order.

Parameters:w¶ – Widget
_set_step_cb(w)¶

Callback to set the step size.

Parameters:w¶ – Widget
_update_plot()¶

Update plot in the ZPlot window if a callback function has been given.

_update_velocity_cb(w)¶

Callback to update velocity parameters (velocity and redshift)

Parameters:w¶ – Widget.
get_fit_lines()¶

Return the selected fit lines.

get_fitted_vector()¶

Return the fitted spectrum.

get_frame()¶

Return the visual gtk.Frame object corresponding to the fitting plugin.

set_apod(apod)¶

Set apodization.

Parameters:apod¶ – Apodization function.
set_order(order)¶

Set order.

Parameters:order¶ – Order.
set_spectrum(spectrum)¶

Set spectrum to fit.

Parameters:spectrum¶ – Spectrum.
set_step(step)¶

Set step size.

Parameters:step¶ – Step size in nm

Regions class¶

class orb.visual.Regions(change_region_properties_cb=None)¶

Bases: object

Manage regions parameters and the visual objects (region menu)

__init__(change_region_properties_cb=None)¶

Init Regions class.

Parameters:change_region_properties_cb¶ – (Optional) method to call in the main window when region properties are changed (default None).
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

_set_method_cb(c, method)¶

callback method to select a new combining method.

Parameters:
  • c¶ – widget.
  • method¶ – Choosen method.
_set_shape_cb(c, shape)¶

Callback function to select region shape.

Parameters:
  • c¶ – Widget.
  • shape¶ – Selected shape.
get_menubar_item()¶

Return the region menubar item

get_method()¶

Get the selected combining method.

get_method_index(method)¶

Return combining method index.

Parameters:method¶ – method.
get_shape()¶

Return selected region shape

get_shape_index(shape)¶

Return region shape index.

Parameters:shape¶ – region shape.
set_method(method)¶

Select a new combining method.

Parameters:method¶ – Selected method.
set_shape(shape)¶

Select region shape.

Parameters:shape¶ – region shape.
